remarks: 'Less than' relationship between subtraction and addition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
ltaddsub2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) < C <-> B < ( C - A ) ) ) $.
